




n=0;

new graph 1 {0,0} ;
/*
0 */
	
	
n=1; 
new graph 6 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} {4,5};
/*	
  1   3
0	     5
  2   4


*/


n=2; 
new graph 11 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} {4,5} {5,6} {5,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,10} {9,10};
/*	
  1   3     6    8
0	     5          10
  2   4     7    9
 */
  
n=3; 
new graph 16 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} {4,5} 
{5,6} {5,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,10} {9,10} {10,11} 
{10,12} {11,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15};
/*	
  1   3     6    8      11   13
0	     5          10           15
  2   4     7    9      12   14
*/  
n=4; 
new graph 21 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} {4,5}
 {5,6} {5,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,10} {9,10} {10,11}
  {10,12} {11,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15} {15,16} 
  {15,17} {16,18} {17,19} {18,20} {19,20};
/*	
  1   3     6    8      11   13      16   18
0	     5          10           15           20
  2   4     7    9      12   14      17   19
  */
  
n=5; 
new graph 26 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} 
{4,5} {5,6} {5,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,10} {9,10} 
{10,11} {10,12} {11,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15}
 {15,16} {15,17} {16,18} {17,19} {18,20} {19,20}
  {20,21} {20,22} {21,23} {22,24} {23,25} {24,25};
/*	
  1   3     6    8      11   13      16   18     21   23
0	     5          10           15           20         25
  2   4     7    9      12   14      17   19     22   24
*/  
n=6; 
new graph 31 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,4} {3,5} {4,5} {5,6}
 {5,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,10} {9,10} {10,11} {10,12}
  {11,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15} {15,16} {15,17}
   {16,18} {17,19} {18,20} {19,20} {20,21} {20,22}
    {21,23} {22,24} {23,25} {24,25} {25,26} {25,27}
     {26,28} {27,29} {28,30} {29,30};
/*	
  1   3     6    8      11   13      16   18     21   23     26   28
0	     5          10           15           20         25           30
  2   4     7    9      12   14      17   19     22   24     27   29
  */
